title: Nizoral Anti-Dandruff Shampoo with 1% Ketoconazole, Fresh Scent, 7 Fl Oz
description: Fresh-smelling anti-dandruff shampoo controls flaking, scaling, and itching associated with dandruff. Made with ketoconazole 1%, use it just twice a week between regular shampoos for dandruff relief. Use as directed
